code: import{useContext}from"react";import AppContext from"../../../Context/AppContext";var StyleElement=function StyleElement(){var _useContext=useContext(AppContext),action=_useContext.action;if(action.darkMode){document.documentElement.style.setProperty("--font-blue-color","rgb(10, 133, 204)");document.documentElement.style.setProperty("--background-dark-light-color","rgb(37, 37, 37)");document.documentElement.style.setProperty("--content-dark-light-color","white");document.documentElement.style.setProperty("--navbar-dark-light-color","lightgray");document.documentElement.style.setProperty("--font-dark-light-color","rgb(37, 37, 37)");}else{document.documentElement.style.setProperty("--font-blue-color","rgb(122, 43, 226)");document.documentElement.style.setProperty("--background-dark-light-color","white");document.documentElement.style.setProperty("--content-dark-light-color","black");document.documentElement.style.setProperty("--navbar-dark-light-color","rgb(37, 37, 37)");document.documentElement.style.setProperty("--font-dark-light-color","white");}return null;};export default StyleElement;
